thread.title: B&B Recap: Zende and Nicole’s family members speak out at their wedding
thread.title_full: B&B Recap: Zende and Nicole’s family members speak out at their wedding

title: B&B Recap: Zende and Nicole’s family members speak out at their wedding
text:
B&B Recap: Zende and Nicole’s family members speak out at their wedding 
Candace Young Wednesday, February 15th, 2017 
Wednesday February 15, 2017: Carter invites Zende and Nicole’s loved ones to say a few words, Pam notices something strange, and Bill predicts Brooke will never marry Ridge. Pin 
At the Forrester mansion, Carter begins Zende and Nicole’s wedding ceremony. Sally and Shirley, dressed as caterers, look on. Sally whispers that this is the Buckingham Palace of fashion and this is the royal family. Carter tells Nicole and Zende’s individual stories, and talks about how they met and fell in love. Pam notices Sally and Shirley watching the ceremony instead of working and complains to Charlie, who is unconcerned. Carter continues to speak about Nicole and Zende being extraordinary people. Carter invites family to say a few words. Kristen and Tony are proud of Zende, Rick jokes about all the advice he and Maya have given them…they are an amazing couple. Eric is proud of his grandson, Zende, and is very happy Nicole has agreed to share her life with him; it’s important to have a strong woman by your side. Maya is grateful to Nicole for giving them Lizzie, and to Zende for recognizing her courage. Ridge wishes them lifelong happiness. Steffy hopes their love and connection will last the rest of their lives…it can happen. Liam winks at her. Julius speaks about the support and acceptance of family; Nicole is marrying a good man and Zende is lucky. “It’s a proud time.” 
More: Former CBS soap actress lands multi-arc episode on Empire 
Carter continues with the ceremony and Zende and Nicole say personal vows to one another. Nicole promises to love Zende every day and to never forget how hard he fought for them. Zende is in awe of Nicole. Every time he thought he couldn’t admire her more, she did something more amazing. He prayed for this day, and he has never been more blown away than he is right now. Zende promises to cherish her every day in their lives together. They exchange rings, Carter pronounces them husband and wife, and they kiss as everyone applauds and cheers. 
Related: B&B’s Katherine Kelly Lang’s Glassell Park home for sale 
In Bill’s office at Spencer Publications, Wyatt tells his father he needs a new assignment. Talk turns to Forrester Creations, and Wyatt reiterates he couldn’t work there with Liam, Steffy, and everything. Bill thinks it was a good call. They touch on the wedding taking place. Bill is sure Ridge thinks the next Forrester wedding will be his. Wyatt recalls that when he and Steffy said their vows, it was a great day. He insists to Bill that he’s let her go, unlike him with Brooke. Bill grumps that Brooke is marrying Ridge for her son, who wants his family reunited, but sadly that’s not going to happen. Bill feels if the Ridge/Brooke wedding hasn’t happened by now, it’s not going to happen. He notes Ridge is dragging his feet, though he’s not sure why. Bill predicts he’ll screw Brooke over like he always does, if he hasn’t already.
